import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { APP_ENV } from "../../../env"; import { IProductItem } from "../types"; const ProductItemPage = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [model, setModel] = useState({ id: 0, name: "", category_id: "", price: 0, description: "", files: [], category: "", }); useEffect(() => { axios .get(`${APP_ENV.REMOTE_HOST_NAME}api/products/${id}`) .then((resp) => { setModel(resp.data); }); }, []); return ( <>

{model.category}

{model.name}

4 Reviews

{model.description}

Color
Size
{model.price} грн.
); }; export default ProductItemPage;
